data.title: Local Obituary Listings in North Hills & Cranberry
data.meta_description: Visit the Devlin Funeral Home website to search local obituaries from our North Hills, PA and Cranberry, PA locations.
data.text:
Clare J. &nbspPorreca

October 16, 1929 - July 04, 2019

Clare Porreca Loving mother, grandmother, sister and friend, died peacefully on July 4th at the age of 89. Daughter of the late Michele and Elizabetta (Rossi), she is preceded in death by her brothers Antonio and Michele. Surviving her are her daughter Ann Campbell (Edward), granddaughters Christy, and her son Mason, and Kaelyn (Bill McLaughlin), […]

Ellen M.&nbsp(Kasper) Frederick

November 26, 1968 - June 30, 2019

Of Ross Twp., on Sunday, June 30, 2019. Beloved wife of 28 years to Reed J. Frederick; loving mother of Michael J., Shawn P. and Sarah M. Frederick; beloved daughter of John and Annette Kasper; sister of Paul Kasper (Cindy) and Daniel Kasper (Lisa); sister-in-law of Eric Frederick and Mary Nagy; also survived by many […]

James&nbspMiller

December 08, 1937 - June 30, 2019

James H. Miller, Jr. Age 81, of Ross Township and formerly of Scott Township, went to be with our Heavenly Father on Sunday, June 30, 2019. Jim was preceded in death by his beloved wife, Kathleen; and son, James H. Miller III. Devoted father to Gretchen (Allen) Graham and Michelle (Brian) Obst; Stepfather to William […]

Marien Elaine &nbspEvans

September 02, 1932 - June 30, 2019

Marien Elaine Evans Age 86, of Seven Fields, passed away peacefully on June 30, 2019. Born Sept. 2, 1932 in Silver City, NM, daughter of the late Henry Neil, and Ruby Belle (Pruit) Mulanax; loving mother of Debra Evans (Kenneth Pokrifka); dear grandma of Brian, and Gwenore Pokrifka; caring aunt of Janet Kunka, Mollie Melvin, […]

John &nbspArmbruster

March 17, 1940 - June 29, 2019

John Armbruster Age 79, of Cranberry Twp., passed away peacefully on Saturday, June 29, 2019. Born March 17, 1940, son of Urban and Alice (McEwan) Armbruster. Beloved husband of Josephine (Lupnacca) Armbruster, whom he married on May 9, 1970; loving father of Darci (Oscar) Quintana, Erin Smith, and Brian Armbruster; pap-pap of Christopher, Adam, Amanda, […]

Andrew F. &nbsp“Andy” Young Jr.

June 24, 1929 - June 28, 2019

Andrew F. “Andy” Young Jr. Age 90<, of Economy Borough passed away on June 28, 2019, with his beloved wife Laura and step sons Barron and Brian Marrien at his side. His death was caused by Pancreatic Cancer inflecting him over a 7month period. Andy was born in Harrisburg Pa. June 24, 1929. He graduated from the University of Maryland in […]

Samuel Charles &nbspCaddick

March 23, 1923 - June 20, 2019

Sam Caddick Age 96, of Freedom, PA passed away peacefully at home on Thursday, June 20th. 2019. He was born in Follansbee, West Virginia to the late Charles and Vola Wright-Caddick. Sam was the oldest of six children. Sam served in WWII in the Air Force, completed fifty two missions, and received honorable discharge as […]

Deborah A.&nbsp(Schwerer) Davis

June 17, 1956 - June 26, 2019

Of Ross Township, on Wednesday, June 26, 2019. Beloved wife of 42 years to William J. Davis, Jr.; loving mother of Holly M. Tschannen (Michael); beloved daughter of Margaret Schwerer and the late Frank Schwerer; sister of Jeffrey Schwerer (Susan), Cynthia Hilldorfer (Michael), and Paul Schwerer (Beth Ann); proud grandmother of Harper and Maddox; also […]

James J.&nbspSchlosser

June 10, 1937 - June 26, 2019

Our beloved brother, husband, father, grandfather, uncle, great uncle, and friend, James Joseph Schlosser of the North Hills, Pittsburgh, passed peacefully away on June 26, 2019, surrounded by loving family and friends. Jim was born in West View on June 10, 1937 to Andrew and Catherine Schlosser, and lived in Pittsburgh his entire life, with […]

Charles&nbspSchlarp

April 08, 1940 - June 22, 2019

Charles E. Schlarp Age 79, of Ross Twp., on Saturday, June 22, 2019. Caring husband for 29 years to Cheryl (Betts); Loving father of Laurie Spatafore, Erik Schlarp (Christine), Melanie Weiss (Joe) and the late David Schlarp; Proud grandfather of Alexander Schlarp; Brother of Charlotte Barnhart, Jackie Bushman, and Margie Syfrett; Brother-in-law of Lillian Betts […]

Nancy&nbspEgerman

February 09, 1937 - June 20, 2019

Nancy I. Egerman (Witt) Age 82, of Ross Twp., on Thursday, June 20, 2019. Wife of the late Edward Egerman; Loving mother of Barbara Watters (Andrew) and the late Leslie Greene (survived by David); Proud grandmother of Alissa Kozak (Edward) and Benjamin Greene; Treasured great-grandmother of Maggie, Noah, Elena, Natalie and Mercedes; Great great-grandmother of […]

Mary Libby&nbsp(Reinsfelder) Meyer

November 07, 1924 - June 17, 2019

Age 94, Of McCandless Twp., on Monday, June 17, 2019. Wife of the late Roy G. Meyer; loving mother of Maureen Heyl (Robert), Karen Fogle (Dennis), Jerry Meyer (Cheryl) and the late Roy Gregory Meyer; also survived by seven grandchildren and 17 great-grandchildren. Friends received Friday, 2-4 and 6-8 at DEVLIN FUNERAL HOME, INC., 806 […]

Marjorie &nbspCapozzi

October 30, 1943 - June 18, 2019

Marjorie “Jeannie” Capozzi, 75, from New Brighton, PA passed away peacefully in her home with her daughter by her side on Tuesday, June 18, 2019 after a long, courageous battle with sarcoma cancer. Marjorie was a student of Western PA School for the Deaf after losing her hearing at age 4. Within WPSD she created […]
